answers.answer: Hon, this could be warning signs from a yeast infection, to urinary tract infection, to diabetes. Please tell an adult to take you to the doctors and have it diagnosed correctly. Hugs~
have u been sexually active to cause this

I agree with xtragr8ful. It can also just be your hormones. I also started my period young and I had a lot of problems with it for the first 3 years. I finally went to a gynecologist and got everything straightened out. You would probably be more comfortable with a female gynecologist, I was, and if you go you can also ask them any questions that you may have that can be too embarrassing to ask anyone else. Best of luck to you.Sissie
i agree with bigsissie you should just go to the doctor in see what they have to say

question: well....i am 12 years old & i have my period, but today i went to the "ladies room" & ...well...um whem i started to pee it came out slimy and gooey & i don't have my period today  it was WEIRD it was the first time this EVER happened to me, CAN SOMEONE TELL ME WHY!!!!! :(
title: anyone who nows WHY!!
